dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
Python Utils is a collection of small Python functions and classes which
make common patterns shorter and easier.
dependencies.name: py-python-utils

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
HybPiper was designed for targeted sequence capture, in which DNA
sequencing libraries are enriched for gene regions of interest,
especially for phylogenetics. HybPiper is a suite of Python scripts that
wrap and connect bioinformatics tools in order to extract target
sequences from high-throughput DNA sequencing reads
dependent_to.name: hybpiper

dependent_to.description: Project to generate recipes for conda packages.
dependent_to.name: py-grayskull

dependent_to.description: Automated pipeline for analyses of fungal ITS from the Illumina
dependent_to.name: py-pipits

dependent_to.description:
This package offers functionalities for user-friendly geo data
processing using GDAL and OGR.
dependent_to.name: py-spatialist

description: A progress bar for Python 2 and Python 3
name: py-progressbar2

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
